data.actual_result: The Client ID is in a black font.
data.expected_result: The Client ID isn't in a black font.
data.short_description: [macOS Mojave Specific] [Firefox Specific] Client IDs and Client Secrets are colored black in the developer applications page.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Developer Applications page. (/developers/applications/) - Open, or create an application
